insert.foreach:
INTO TB_ATTACH_GROUP(gno, cno, mno, bno) VALUES(seq_attach_group.nextval, #{item.cno}, #{item.mno}, #{item.bno})
INTO TB_ATTACH(uuid, fileName, fileType, gno, path) VALUES(#{file.uuid}, #{file.fileName}, #{file.fileType}, seq_attach_group.nextval, #{file.path})

mapper.delete: delete from TB_ATTACH_GROUP a where NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TB_ATTACH b WHERE b.GNO=a.GNO)
delete TB_ATTACH where gno = (select gno from TB_ATTACH_GROUP where cno = #{cno})
